channel.title: Need help on commands
channel.description: need help on a commands that i can ::message and everyone see it but just for owner :confused: :confused: base:delta

item.title: Need help on commands
item.dc:creator: @shamu308 shamu308
item.description:
@shamu308 wrote:

[quote=“Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS, post:10, topic:311592”][quote author=shamu308 link=topic=408039.msg3012862#msg3012862 date=1256973929]

Explain more, what base, more information?

If you want a basic Delta command for only owner.

if (command.startsWith("message") { String message = command.substring(8); if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[OWNER]: "+message+""); } else if (playerRights < 3) { sM("You must be an owner to use this command."); } }

i try both and they dont work
[/quote]

Hmm well I’ll spoonfeed you.

Step 1: Open client.java
Step 2: Press and hold CTRL + F
Step 3: Put code[/code] in the box. Hit search.
Step 4: Under if(command.startsWith("gfx") && playerRights >= 3) { int gfx = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if(gfx < 655){ stillgfx(gfx, absY, absX); } } add if (command.startsWith("message") { String message = command.substring(8); if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[SYSTEM]: "+message+""); } else if (playerRights < 3) { sM("You must be an owner to use this command."); } }
Step 5: Save and compile.[/quote]
it said error 1client.java:8487:'expected if (command.startwith<“message”>

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on commands
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

[quote=“shamu308, post:8, topic:311592”][quote author=Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS link=topic=408039.msg3012847#msg3012847 date=1256972983]
Explain more, what base, more information?

If you want a basic Delta command for only owner.

if (command.startsWith("message") { String message = command.substring(8); if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[OWNER]: "+message+""); } else if (playerRights < 3) { sM("You must be an owner to use this command."); } }

[/quote]
i try both and they dont work[/quote]

Hmm well I’ll spoonfeed you.

Step 1: Open client.java
Step 2: Press and hold CTRL + F
Step 3: Put code[/code] in the box. Hit search.
Step 4: Under if(command.startsWith("gfx") && playerRights >= 3) { int gfx = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if(gfx < 655){ stillgfx(gfx, absY, absX); } } add if (command.startsWith("message") { String message = command.substring(8); if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[SYSTEM]: "+message+""); } else if (playerRights < 3) { sM("You must be an owner to use this command."); } }
Step 5: Save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on commands
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[System Message]: " + text.substring(1)); }
I spent time actually editing that and testing it on my server, all is good. I used a DeltaScape base too so nothing should be wrong.

Read full topic
